The Technology Behind WinShade

Understanding what makes this breakthrough possible

01

EXE Analysis

WinShade analyzes Windows game executables to identify DirectX/OpenGL calls and injection points.

game.exe → DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH → Hook Graphics API
02

Runtime Injection

Our custom DLL loader injects the Reshade runtime directly into the game process during execution.

winshade.exe + winshade.dll → Runtime Hook
03

Shader Processing

Shaders are compiled on-demand using mobile-optimized GLSL, with automatic fallbacks for compatibility.

HLSL → GLSL ES → GPU Pipeline
❌

WinShade Method
